scripts.install:all: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: npm install -g @angular/cli && cd client/Greenhouse_App_Part3-clientside-main/greenhouse-app-part2 && npm install && ng build --output-path=../../../server/Greenhouse_App_Part3-serverside-main/dist/client && cd ../../../server/Greenhouse_App_Part3-serverside-main && npm install && npm run build
